question: Which vehicle is parked in violation of parking regulations?
Does the driver of the passenger car have the right to stop on the road shown in the image, located in a populated area, for the purpose of picking up passengers?
Which vehicle driver may continue driving in the direction of the arrow at this traffic signal?
In this situation, which driver has the right of way if the driver of the yellow car begins to move after dropping off passengers and the driver of the black car stops to pick up passengers?

answers.text: The driver of the yellow car
The driver of the black car

question: Does the driver of the passenger car have the right to continue driving in the direction of the arrow if there is no passenger boarding or disembarking at the tram stop?
In this situation, does the driver of the passenger car have the right to continue without stopping?
In this situation, which vehicle is prohibited from driving in the direction of the arrow?

answers.text: Only the driver of the blue car
Only the driver of the red car

question: The driver of the passenger car intends to turn right at the intersection. Does he violate traffic rules if:

answers.text: Overtakes the bus, moves to the right lane, and then turns right
Overtakes the bus and turns right from the second lane
Lets the bus pass, moves to the right lane, and then turns right
Lets the bus pass and turns right from the second lane

question: The driver of the passenger car is allowed to move:

answers.text: Only in directions A and C
Only in directions B and C
Only in directions A and B

question: Can the driver of the passenger car stop in the populated area shown in the image for the purpose of picking up passengers?
The driver of the passenger vehicle is allowed to move:
Which parked vehicle is given priority when starting to move in the direction of the arrow, if the bus driver starts moving from the marked bus stop in a populated area?

answers.text: The driver of the passenger car.

question: Which vehicle is given priority when moving in the direction of the arrow?

answers.text: The driver of the black car
The driver of the white car

question: Is the driver allowed to stop or park the vehicle in a tunnel marked with a road sign, in the event of danger, where there are no marked places for special stops?
Is it permissible to leave the vehicle with the engine running during a long-term stop in a tunnel marked with a road sign?
Which of these symbols is the emergency stop sign?
To assess the condition of a victim in a traffic accident, the first step is to:

answers.text: Only open the airways and check breathing
Only check the carotid artery pulse
Open the airways, check breathing, check consciousness, and check the carotid artery pulse
